title: [Banthal's Magic Shoppe]
[Banthal's Weaponry]
[Banthal's Outfitting]
[Banthal's Armory]
description: Beneath a ceiling of jagged crystals, a sphere-hilted mounted sword plaque hangs on one of the iridescent crystal walls.  A heavy lead glass display case sits in one corner while a suit of silver-chased armor rests on the crystal floor.
